item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-23
item.description: FDA approves remdesivir to treat COVID-19 (3 minute read) The FDA has approved remdesivir as a treatment for COVID-19 in hospitalized patients.
